Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for GoodLife AC-300 to AC-305 (standard and Professional) Blood Glucose Monitoring Systems for quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood using electrochemical biosensor technology.
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertips; standard models for single-patient self-testing at home by people with diabetes, professional models for multiple patient use by healthcare professionals in clinical settings (not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use).
